name: Glance of gloomy past
description:
A third person stealth game, where you have powers to become invisible, blind and deafen  enemies and take them down.

The story revolves around a character who has amnesia and you uncover stories behind his past as you go.

Sorry when you come across a scene where the AI animation isn't played. Noticed when it's already late.

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Q- Take Cover

F- Assasinate

1,2,3-  Equip Abilities

Left Mouse Click- Use Abilities

Left Control - Crouch

Ability 1 - Blocks Vision of enemy

Ability 2- Blocks Hearing of enemy

Ability 3- Player turns completely invisible
